name: Classic Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta in salted water. Fry guanciale until crispy. Beat eggs with cheese. Combine all ingredients.

name: Simple Tomato Basil Pasta
instructions: Sauté garlic in olive oil, add tomatoes, simmer 10 minutes, toss with pasta and basil.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell pepper, carrot)
instructions: Heat wok, add oil, stir-fry vegetables, season with soy sauce and ginger.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Mix butter and sugars, add eggs and vanilla, mix dry ingredients, fold in chocolate chips, bake at 375°F for 12 minutes.
